IRS990EZ.PrimaryExemptPurposeTxt: METROHEALTH FRIENDS OF MOTHERS & INFANTS (M&I) PROMOTES THE HEALTH AND WELL BEING OF FAMILIES BY PROVIDING ESSENTIAL ITEMS FOR MOTHERS AND INFANTS/CHILDREN WHO ARE CLIENTS OF THE METROHEALTH CENTER FOR COMMUNITY HEALTH (CLEVELAND, OH).

ProgramSrvcAccomplishmentGrp.DescriptionProgramSrvcAccomTxt: WHO IS ELIGIBLE FOR ASSISTANCE? METROHEALTH FRIENDS OF MOTHERS & INFANTS (M&I) ARE DEDICATED TO SERVING CLIENTS WHO RECEIVE THEIR HEALTH CARE FROM THE METROHEALTH CENTER FOR COMMUNITY HEALTH, A DEPARTMENT OF THE METROHEALTH SYSTEM, TARGETING THE NEEDS OF UNDER-SERVED COMMUNITIES IN THE GREATER CLEVELAND AREA. CLINICS SERVEDMETROHEALTH CENTER FOR COMMUNITY HEALTH: BROADWAY HEALTH CENTER, BUCKEYE HEALTH CENTER, J. GLEN SMITH HEALTH CENTER, LEE-HARVARD HEALTH CENTER, THOMAS F. MCCAFFERTY HEALTH CENTER, BROOKLYN MEDICAL GROUP, STRONGSVILLE MEDICAL GROUP, WEST PARK MEDICAL GROUP. WE ALSO SERVE MERRICK HOUSE (WEST). HOW DOES THE METROHEALTH FRIENDS OF MOTHERS & INFANTS HELP? FRIENDS OF M & I COLLECT, PURCHASE, AND DISTRIBUTE BRAND NEW: - LAYETTE ITEMS ~ INFANT SLEEPERS, ONESIES, RECEIVING BLANKETS, QUILTS, SOCKS, HATS - TODDLER CLOTHING - DIAPERS & WIPES - PORTABLE PLAYYARDS - STROLLERS - MATERNITY CLOTHING OUR YEAR-ROUND DISTRIBUTION PROGRAM SERVES HUNDREDS OF NEEDY FAMILIES ANNUALLY. - REFERRALS ARE MADE TO FRIENDS OF M & I BY METROHEALTH CENTER FOR COMMUNITY HEALTH SOCIAL WORKERS. - FRIENDS OF M & I PROVIDE PRACTICAL, QUALITY INFANT/CHILDRENS PRODUCTS. - OUR PRODUCTS ARE PURCHASED DIRECTLY FROM RELIABLE MANUFACTURERS AT FAIR PRICES. - OVER 0.95 OF EVERY DOLLAR DONATED GOES DIRECTLY TO SERVING MOTHERS, INFANTS, AND CHILDREN IN NEED. ALL PRODUCTS DISTRIBUTED ARE BRAND NEW. ________________________________________________________________________ SUMMARY OF PRODUCTS DISTRIBUTED SEPTEMBER 2021 ~ AUGUST 2022 LAYETTES~179 INFANT CLOTHING ORDERS 11 CHILDREN'S CLOTHING ORDERS ~ 15 PORTABLE CRIBS ~ 88 STROLLERS ~ SINGLE - 40; DOUBLE- 8 CAR SEATS~ 38 BOOSTER SEATS~ 3 DIAPERS ~ 9,998; WIPES ~ 13,074 BLANKETS~ 343 MISCELLANEOUS ITEMS ~ 724 ITEMS: HATS; TOYS; XMAS STOCKINGS; BIBS; BURB CLOTHS; HATS AND MITTENS; WINTER COATS; INFANT BATHTUB NEWBORN LAYETTES MADE WITH DIAPERS AND WIPES SINCE 09/01/2021: 186 (LY: 232) (APPROX. 8,184 DIAPERS AND 13,392 WIPES) SUMMARY OF PRODUCTS DISTRIBUTED TO MH CLINICS AND MOMS FIRST PROGRAM- MERRICK HOUSE DECEMBER 1, 2021 - FEBRUARY 29, 2022 MH BEDFORD: LAYETTES: 0 (YTD: 8) PORTABLE CRIBS: 0 (YTD: 3) CAR SEAT: 0 (YTD: 1) DIAPERS: 0 (YTD: 1,307) WIPES: 0 (YTD: 1,360) BLANKETS: 0 (YTD: 13) PJ'S: 30 (YTD: 30) MH BROADWAY: LAYETTES: 21 (YTD: 46) BLANKETS: 10 (YTD: 47) PJ'S: 30 (YTD:30) MH BROOKLYN: PORTABLE CRIBS: 1 (YTD: 1) MH BUCKEYE: LAYETTES: 0 (YTD: 2) INFANT CLOTHING ORDERS: 0 (YTD: 3) CHILDREN'S CLOTHING ORDERS: 0 (YTD: 3) STROLLERS: 0 (YTD: 5) PORTABLE CRIBS: 0 (YTD: 4) DIAPERS: 244 (YTD: 420) WIPES: 504 (YTD: 504) BLANKETS: 9 (YTD: 21) PJ'S : 30 (YTD: 30) MH J. METROHEALTH FRIENDS OF MOTHERS & INFANTS (M&I) PROMOTES THE HEALTH AND WELL BEING OF FAMILIES BY PROVIDING ESSENTIAL ITEMS FOR MOTHERS AND INFANTS/CHILDREN WHO ARE CLIENTS OF THE METROHEALTH CENTER FOR COMMUNITY HEALTH (CLEVELAND, OH).

WHO IS ELIGIBLE FOR ASSISTANCE? METROHEALTH FRIENDS OF MOTHERS & INFANTS (M&I) ARE DEDICATED TO SERVING CLIENTS WHO RECEIVE THEIR HEALTH CARE FROM THE METROHEALTH CENTER FOR COMMUNITY HEALTH, A DEPARTMENT OF THE METROHEALTH SYSTEM, TARGETING THE NEEDS OF UNDER-SERVED COMMUNITIES IN THE GREATER CLEVELAND AREA. CLINICS SERVEDMETROHEALTH CENTER FOR COMMUNITY HEALTH: BROADWAY HEALTH CENTER, BUCKEYE HEALTH CENTER, J. GLEN SMITH HEALTH CENTER, LEE-HARVARD HEALTH CENTER, THOMAS F. MCCAFFERTY HEALTH CENTER, BROOKLYN MEDICAL GROUP, STRONGSVILLE MEDICAL GROUP, WEST PARK MEDICAL GROUP. WE ALSO SERVE MERRICK HOUSE (WEST). HOW DOES THE METROHEALTH FRIENDS OF MOTHERS & INFANTS HELP? FRIENDS OF M & I COLLECT, PURCHASE, AND DISTRIBUTE BRAND NEW: - LAYETTE ITEMS ~ INFANT SLEEPERS, ONESIES, RECEIVING BLANKETS, QUILTS, SOCKS, HATS - TODDLER CLOTHING - DIAPERS & WIPES - PORTABLE PLAYYARDS - STROLLERS - MATERNITY CLOTHING OUR YEAR-ROUND DISTRIBUTION PROGRAM SERVES HUNDREDS OF NEEDY FAMILIES ANNUALLY. - REFERRALS ARE MADE TO FRIENDS OF M & I BY METROHEALTH CENTER FOR COMMUNITY HEALTH SOCIAL WORKERS. - FRIENDS OF M & I PROVIDE PRACTICAL, QUALITY INFANT/CHILDRENS PRODUCTS. - OUR PRODUCTS ARE PURCHASED DIRECTLY FROM RELIABLE MANUFACTURERS AT FAIR PRICES. - OVER 0.95 OF EVERY DOLLAR DONATED GOES DIRECTLY TO SERVING MOTHERS, INFANTS, AND CHILDREN IN NEED. ALL PRODUCTS DISTRIBUTED ARE BRAND NEW. ________________________________________________________________________ SUMMARY OF PRODUCTS DISTRIBUTED SEPTEMBER 2021 ~ AUGUST 2022 LAYETTES~179 INFANT CLOTHING ORDERS 11 CHILDREN'S CLOTHING ORDERS ~ 15 PORTABLE CRIBS ~ 88 STROLLERS ~ SINGLE - 40; DOUBLE- 8 CAR SEATS~ 38 BOOSTER SEATS~ 3 DIAPERS ~ 9,998; WIPES ~ 13,074 BLANKETS~ 343 MISCELLANEOUS ITEMS ~ 724 ITEMS: HATS; TOYS; XMAS STOCKINGS; BIBS; BURB CLOTHS; HATS AND MITTENS; WINTER COATS; INFANT BATHTUB NEWBORN LAYETTES MADE WITH DIAPERS AND WIPES SINCE 09/01/2021: 186 (LY: 232) (APPROX. 8,184 DIAPERS AND 13,392 WIPES) SUMMARY OF PRODUCTS DISTRIBUTED TO MH CLINICS AND MOMS FIRST PROGRAM- MERRICK HOUSE DECEMBER 1, 2021 - FEBRUARY 29, 2022 MH BEDFORD: LAYETTES: 0 (YTD: 8) PORTABLE CRIBS: 0 (YTD: 3) CAR SEAT: 0 (YTD: 1) DIAPERS: 0 (YTD: 1,307) WIPES: 0 (YTD: 1,360) BLANKETS: 0 (YTD: 13) PJ'S: 30 (YTD: 30) MH BROADWAY: LAYETTES: 21 (YTD: 46) BLANKETS: 10 (YTD: 47) PJ'S: 30 (YTD:30) MH BROOKLYN: PORTABLE CRIBS: 1 (YTD: 1) MH BUCKEYE: LAYETTES: 0 (YTD: 2) INFANT CLOTHING ORDERS: 0 (YTD: 3) CHILDREN'S CLOTHING ORDERS: 0 (YTD: 3) STROLLERS: 0 (YTD: 5) PORTABLE CRIBS: 0 (YTD: 4) DIAPERS: 244 (YTD: 420) WIPES: 504 (YTD: 504) BLANKETS: 9 (YTD: 21) PJ'S : 30 (YTD: 30) MH J.
